name: NightMall
description:
NightMall is a stealth action game that take place in a Mall (obviously).

For the moment, there is only the Guard mode available, that allow you to play as a guard that need to survey the Mall during the night.

There will be at least 1 other mode in the final release.

The current version of the game is 0.6

If you want more informations, check out our Twitter account @6tydev or follow me on Itch.io
